articles.title: Actor Paul Sorvino, known for roles in Goodfellas, Law & Order, dies at 83 - CBC News
articles.description: In his over 50 years in the entertainment business, Sorvino was a mainstay in films and television, playing an Italian American communist in Warren Beatty's Reds, Henry Kissinger in Oliver Stone's Nixon and mob boss Eddie Valentine in The Rocketeer.
articles.content:
Paul Sorvino, an imposing actor who specialized in playing crooks and cops like Paulie Cicero in Goodfellas and the NYPD sergeant Phil Cerretta on Law & Order, has died. He was 83.
His publicist… [+2835 chars]

articles.title: Northeast US swelters under 'extremely oppressive' heat; wildfires continue out west - News 19 WLTX
articles.description: More than 85 million Americans woke up Sunday to excessive heat warnings or heat advisories.
